hotels.description: Nestled in Baden-Baden's historic parklands, Brenners Park-Hotel & Spa whispers tales of European royalty, where the Black Forest meets Belle Époque grandeur. This masterpiece rises above manicured gardens and houses the legendary Villa Stéphanie Spa - a 5,000-square-metre wellness playground with magnificent park views. Let your tastebuds dance in Michelin-worthy dining venues that a modern-day Gatsby would call home. Whether you're sipping champagne in the glass-wrapped Wintergarten watching the seasons paint the Lichtentaler Allee, or making memories over signature cocktails at Oleander Bar, every corner of this hotel serves up a feast for the senses.
